1.0.name: wordpress/wp-word-count
1.0.description: WP Word Count is a plugin for WordPress that gives you word count statistics for your blog's posts and pages. In addition to overall stats, WP Word Count also gives figures and details for the largest posts and pages of your blog as well as breakdowns by author and month. A simple sidebar widget is included if you wish to display your word count statistics to your readers.
